query: WITH entities AS (SELECT created_at, id FROM core_disbursals WHERE COALESCE(credit_facility_id = $1, $1 IS NULL) AND COALESCE(obligation_id = $2, $2 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE((created_at, id) < ($5, $4), $4 IS NULL)) ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC LIMIT $3) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $6 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_disbursal_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.created_at desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
